OCTEON SDK overview

The OCTEON SDK provides a development environment for writing applications for OCTEON.

It supports both standalone applications using the OCTEON Simple Executive runtime environment as well as Linux application development.

The SDK consists of:

  • toolchains for both simple executive and linux development
  • debugger for simple executive and Linux
  • Simple executive that provides hardware abstraction and standalone runtime support.
  • OCTEON simulator and utilities for simulated packet IO and performance visualization
  • bootloader for simulator and evaluation board.
  • Linux kernel supporting SMP operation on OCTEON
  • Linux userspace distribution for OCTEON
  • Example programs that demonstrate various OCTEON features
  • Documentation
  • Optional SDK components are also available that provide additional software features.
